mapper.select: SELECT p.postIdx,p.postDailyTitle, p.postDailyContents, p.postDailyRegDate, p.postDailyHits, m.memberNickname FROM postDaily as p JOIN member as m ON p.memberIdx=m.memberIdx ORDER BY postIdx DESC
mapper.insert: insert into postDaily(postIdx, postDailyTitle, postDailyContents,memberIdx) values(#{postIdx},#{postDailyTitle}, #{postDailyContents},#{memberIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT postDailyTitle, memberIdx, postDailyRegDate, postDailyContents, postDailyHits FROM postDaily WHERE postDailyTitle=#{postDailyTitle}

SELECT p.postIdx, p.postDailyTitle, p.memberIdx, p.postDailyRegDate, p.postDailyContents, p.postDailyHits, m.memberNickname FROM postDaily as p JOIN member as m ON p.memberIdx=m.memberIdx WHERE postIdx=#{postIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE postDaily SET postDailyTitle=#{postDailyTitle}, postDailyContents=#{postDailyContents} where postIdx=#{postIdx}
